records.location_details: Chios, Greece. Detected inside Greek Territorial Waters in Operational Area J. Latitude and Longitude text removed (reference to operational area).
records.where_clear: Near Chios, Greece, inside Greek Territorial Waters.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific latitude and longitude were removed from the report, only general location 'Chios, Greece' and 'Operational Area J' are provided.
records.context_note: A rubberboat with migrants was detected by a Danish Fennec Helicopter inside Greek Territorial Waters near Chios. The Hellenic Coast Guard (HCG) intercepted the boat. The Danish detachment later received a request from HCG to change the reported coordinates to indicate the incident occurred outside Greek Territorial Waters, which was denied. The Danish detachment assessed this request was not a misunderstanding.
records.evidence_quote: During patrol in Area J near Chios a rubberboat with migrants is detected and identified inside Greek Territorial Waters by the crew onboard the Danish Fennec Helicopter.
